title: VA - Rock Instrumental Classics, Vol 3 & 4 @320
description:
1. VA - Rock Instrumental Classics, Vol.3 (The &#039;70s)

Rhino&#039;s third rock instrumentals volume covers the &#039;70s, a period that found disco, funk, and fusion joining the formula alongside one-shot concept works and the usual novelty numbers. The 18 cuts include stomping club/funk from B.T. Express and Brass Construction, King Curtis&#039; updated honking sax cover of Led Zeppelin&#039;s "Whole Lotta Love," very stylized material from the Electric Light Orchestra and Deodato, and memorable outings by Billy Preston, Edgar Winter, and AWB. Gary Glitter, Edgar Winter, the Chakachas, Rhinoceros, and Van McCoy offer lighter pop variations, and "Sun Goddess" was a musically adventurous excursion into fusion by Earth, Wind & Fire. (AMG)


01. Apollo 100 Featuring Tom Parker - Joy                                                                              
02. Billy Preston - Outa-Space                                                                                          
03. MFSB Featuring The Three Degrees - TSOP (The Sound of Philadelphia)                                                
04. Van McCoy With The Soul City Symphony - The Hustle                                                                  
05. Brass Construction - Movin&#039;                                                                                        
06. Ramsey Lewis & Earth, Wind & Fire - Sun Goddess                                                                    
07. King Curtis & The Kingpins - Whole Lotta Love                                                                      
08. Electric Light Orchestra - Daybreaker                                                                              
09. Deodato - Also Sprach Zarathustra (2001)                                                                            
10. Gary Glitter - Rock And Roll Part 2                                                                                
11. AWB - Pick Up The Pieces                                                                                            
12. Walter Murphy & The Big Apple Band - A Fifth Of Beethoven                                                          
13. Hot Butter - Popcorn                                                                                                
14. B.T. Express - Express                                                                                              
15. The Chakachas - Jungle Fever                                                                                        
16. The Nite-Liters - K-Jee                                                                                            
17. Rhinoceros - Apricot Brandy                                                                                        
18. The Edgar Winter Group - Frankenstein            



2. VA - Rock Instrumental Classics, Vol.4 (Soul)

While the material on volume four of Rhino&#039;s rock instrumentals set chronologically preceded what was on the third volume, no soul, R&B, or even soul-jazz and funk fan should mind these 18 genuine classics, including two superb numbers from Booker T. and the MGs, seminal tracks by the Mar-Keys, Bar-Kays, and Cannonball Adderley, and great Latin tunes from Ray Barretto and Mongo Santamaria. There&#039;s absolutely no fluff, and the presence on CD of rare cuts like the Young Holt Trio&#039;s "Wack Wack" and Alvin Cash & the Crawlers&#039; "Twine Time" is most welcome.


01. Booker T. & The Mg&#039;s - Green Onions                                                                                
02. Hugh Masakela - Grazing In The Grass                                                                                
03. Cliff Nobles & Co. - The Horse                                                                                      
04. King Curtis & The Noble Knights - Soul Twist                                                                        
05. Mar-Keys - Last Night                                                                                              
06. Ramsey Lewis Trio - The In Crowd                                                                                    
07. The Bar-Kays - Soul Finger                                                                                          
08. Manu Dibango - Soul Makossa                                                                                        
09. Alvin Cash & The Crawlers - Twine Time                                                                              
10. Young-Holt Unlimited - Soulful Strut                                                                                
11. Booker T. & The Mg&#039;s - Hang &#039;em High                                                                                
12. Cannonball Adderley - Mercy, Mercy, Mercy                                                                          
13. Ray Barretto Y Su Charanga Moderna - El Watusi                                                                      
14. Mongo Santamaria - Watermelon Man                                                                                  
15. El Chicano - Viva Tirado-Part1                                                                                      
16. Booker T. & The Mg&#039;s - Hip Hug-Her                                                                                  
17. The Young Holt Trio - Wack Wack                                                                                    
18. Booker T. & The Mg&#039;s - Time Is Tight


Label: Rhino
Date: 1994

BITRATE: 320
